1x4 with orthogonal items.
All items share 'first-row' Baseline Context. No item shares any column-like Baseline Context.
Orthogonal items don't participate in baseline alignment in the row-like Baseline Context; since no item shares column-like Baseline Context, neither 'aling-self' or 'justify-self' apply.
